sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useCart } from "../../context/CartContext"; import Header from "../../components/Header"; import Navigation from "../../components/Navigation"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import { formatCurrency } from "../../utilities/formatCurrency"; function Checkout() { const { onCheckout, totalPrice } = useCart(); const [shipping, setShipping] = useState(0); const [discount, setDiscount] = useState(0); const tax = totalPrice * 0.06; const [currentSection, setCurrentSection] = useState("contact-info") const [completedSections, setCompletedSections] = useState([]); const [addressIsSame, setAddressIsSame] = useState(true); const [showShippingOptions, setShowShippingOptions] = useState(false); const [showDiscountOptions, setShowDiscountOptions] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { onCheckout(); }, []); const getInputValue = (id) => { const input = document.getElementById(id); return input?.value || ""; } const isSectionComplete = (id) => { const inputs = document.getElementsByName(id); for (let i = 0; i < inputs.length; i++) { if (inputs[i].required && inputs[i].value === "") { return false; } } return true } const AddressInfo = ({ id, onSubmit }) => { return (
) } const ContactInfo = ({ actionAd }) => { return (
{completedSections.includes("contact-info") && }
) } return (

Checkout

{currentSection === "contact-info" ?

1. Contact Information

: completedSections.includes("contact-info") ?

2. Contact Information

{getInputValue("first-name") + " " + getInputValue("last-name")}

{getInputValue("email")}

{getInputValue("phone")}

setCurrentSection("contact-info")} style={{ width: "100%" }} className="button-outlined">Edit
:

2. Contact Information

} {currentSection === "shipping-info" ?

2. Shipping Information

Ship To:

{completedSections.includes("shipping-info") && }
: completedSections.includes("shipping-info") ?

2. Shipping Information

{getInputValue("shipping-first-name") + " " + getInputValue("shipping-last-name")}

{getInputValue("street-address") + " " + getInputValue("apt-no")}

{getInputValue("city").toUpperCase() + ", " + getInputValue("state") + " " + getInputValue("zip-code") + " US 🇺🇸"}

setCurrentSection("shipping-info")} style={{ width: "100%" }} className="button-outlined">Edit
:

2. Shipping Information

} {currentSection === "billing-info" ?

3. Billing Information

{ !addressIsSame && }
{completedSections.includes("contact-info") && }
: completedSections.includes("billing-info") ?

3. Billing Information

{getInputValue("first-name") + " " + getInputValue("last-name")}

{getInputValue("city").toUpperCase() + ", " + getInputValue("state") + " " + getInputValue("zip-code") + " US 🇺🇸"}

{getInputValue("credit-card-num") + " " + getInputValue("exp-date") + getInputValue("cvv")}

setCurrentSection("shipping-info")} style={{ width: "100%" }} className="button-outlined">Edit
:

3. Billing Information

}

Order Summary

Subtotal:

{formatCurrency(totalPrice)}

Shipping:

{shipping == 0 ? "Free" : formatCurrency(shipping)}

{!showShippingOptions ? :
}

Discount:

{formatCurrency(discount)}

{!showDiscountOptions ? :
}

Tax:

{formatCurrency(tax)}

Order Total:

{formatCurrency(totalPrice + tax + shipping + discount)}

This is just a fictional e-commerce website made for educational purposes. The data you enter will not actually be collected or seen upon submitting this form.

) } export default Checkout
